channel.title: McGeown on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in McGeown on DefinIT

item.title: Welcome to DefinIT!
item.description: If you’ve been here before, you may have noticed a couple of changes – the theme and name of this blog for example, and hopefully you’ve been redirected to a new URL! There are a couple of reasons for the changes, all of which are aimed at increasing the presence and visitor numbers on this site: Branding. Whether I like it or not, “McGeown” is not easy to spell or remember so I wanted to move away from it as an identity.
